MamaCare — Support

Welcome to Mama Care Support! We are here to assist both Parents and Nannies with anything they need on the platform. Whether you are facing technical issues, payment concerns, booking confusion, or have general questions — our team is ready to help.

How We Can Help

  • Account setup and login assistance
  • Booking-related help for both Parents and Nannies
  • Payment support and refund guidance
  • Nanny verification & background check support
  • Child profile and safety concerns
  • Technical troubleshooting (App or Website)

When to Contact Support

If you experience unexpected issues, notice unusual activity, or need clarification on how Mama Care works — feel free to reach out anytime. Your safety and smooth experience are our priority.

Frequently Asked Questions

Before contacting support, you may find your answer quickly in our FAQ section:

  • How to book a Nanny?
  • How does the Nanny verification process work?
  • How do payments and refunds work?
  • How do I update my availability?
  • How to manage multiple children under one parent profile?
